sentence.Network_en: The cold weather had most deleterious consequences among the chrysanthemums.
sentence.Network_cn: 寒冷的天气对菊花产生了极有害的影响.

sentence.Network_en: Petty crime is having a deleterious effect on community life.
sentence.Network_cn: 轻微罪行正对社区生活产生有害影响。

sentence.Network_en: Exactly why the foreign body is so deleterious is not clear.
sentence.Network_cn: 异物为什么如此有害,其确切原因尚不清楚.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: via medieval Latin from Greek dēlētērios 'noxious' + -ous

entry.def: Something that has a deleterious effect on something has a harmful effect on it.

example.ex: Petty crime is having a deleterious effect on community life.
example.tran: 轻微罪行正对社区生活产生有害影响。
